hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT theme FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.theme.model.impl.SThemeImpl AS theme WHERE isDefault = :isDefault AND type = :type

SELECT theme FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.theme.model.impl.SThemeImpl AS theme WHERE type = :type AND lastUpdateDate IN ( SELECT MAX(lastUpdateDate) FROM org.bonitasoft.engine.theme.model.impl.SThemeImpl AS t WHERE t.type = :type AND t.tenantId = theme.tenantId )
